    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <catalog>fnbe</catalog>
            <entry>http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=169&file=169_AUKON-TEKEMINEN.JPG</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fi">Aukon tekeminen</string>
            <string language="en">Making an opening</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden einer Öffnung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fabrication d'une ouverture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo uma abertura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare un'apertura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή ενός ανοίγματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación de una apertura</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten kaksi- tai useampiosaisella prässimuotilla tehtyyn savityöhön tehdään aukko.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how a gap is made in the ceramic work by using a two-piece press mould or a press mould composed of several pieces.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">work</string>
            <string language="en">two-piece</string>
            <string language="en">press</string>
            <string language="en">ceramic</string>
            <string language="en">mould</string>
            <string language="en">gap</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityökasvatus</string>
            <string language="fi">useampiosaiset</string>
            <string language="fi">savi</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
            <string language="fi">kaksi-</string>
            <string language="fi">muottitekniikka,</string>
            <string language="fi">prässimuotit</string>
            <string language="fi">tai</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt, wie ein Abstand in der 
keramischen Arbeit gebildet wird, indem man eine zweiteilige 
Presseform oder eine Presseform verwendet, die aus einigen Stücken 
bestehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre comment un intervalle est fait 
dans le travail en céramique en utilisant un moule en deux pièces de
presse ou un moule de presse composé de plusieurs morceaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra como uma abertura é feita no 
trabalho cerâmico usando um molde de duas partes da imprensa ou um 
molde da imprensa composto de diversas partes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra come uno spacco è fatto 
nel lavoro di ceramica usando una muffa a due pezzi della pressa o una
muffa della pressa composta di parecchie parti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς ένα χάσμα γίνεται στην 
κεραμική εργασία με τη χρησιμοποίηση μιας two-piece φόρμας 
Τύπου ή μιας φόρμας Τύπου που αποτελείται από διάφορα 
κομμάτια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra cómo un boquete es hecho en 
el trabajo de cerámica usando un molde de dos piezas de la prensa o 
un molde de la prensa integrado por varios pedazos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zweiteilig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Presse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">keramisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
